name: 代号608/CODE608
description:
This game is a puzzle, thriller, horror, visual novel, RPG game, the overall style belongs to the pixel steampunk style
In the apocalyptic world of steampunk, detective Alice Weir investigates a serial murder case,
Unfortunately, he was shot dead by a killer during the investigation, but everything was just beginning.....


Current version of the game
The main character, Alice Weir, deciphers various cases to find the ultimate killer

Main features:
1. The main plot is divided into six chapters. According to the player's choice and the detection of the case, there will be a variety of failed endings, but the most successful ending is only one
2. There are two kinds of combat in the game. One is weapon combat, which is equipped with different weapons with different skills.
The other kind of battle is the interrogation battle, the higher level will obtain the more advanced interrogation skills, through the success of the interrogation to obtain the final clues of the case
3. There are multiple side quests in the game to help players grow and improve
4. Current character level is up to 10.


If you meet any problems in the game, please leave a message in the steam community feedback to me immediately, I will learn to repair immediately
Since this is an experience version, I hope you can give me more feedback so that I can continue to improve the quality of the game
You can also follow the author's official bilibili account to leave comments and feedback
The main language of this work is simplified Chinese. If there is any grammatical error in other language versions, please leave a message in the Steam community in time and I will fix it immediately


To switch languages, go to the Steam library and right-click on the game, and go to Properties Select Language
